how to use valixym.net

The previous version of my website had some obscure features that went undocumented. I figured it would be a cool idea to list the features on my new site in a central help file.

pro-tips

When you see text that looks like this, it's a pro-tip. It serves as a quick note or comment on whatever text it's applied to, sorta like a footnote. All you need to do to access the secret wisdom is to lightly hover over it. You should see a little question mark on your cursor. Brace for life-changing information.
built using malinowy
